content:
<div>
  <div class='center two-thirds'>
    <h2>Welcome to docker hello doc</h2>
    <a ng-click="go('jozsef.bash.confidentalInfo')">
      Commands hello friend
    </a>
    <div class='left'>
      <div ng-repeat='(key, value) in cmds'>
        <b>{{key}}</b>
        <div class='indent' ng-repeat='(key, value) in value'>
          <zd><b> {{key}} </b> - {{value}}</zd>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

keywords.$appPort:
This variable needs to be the port that the server will be running on within the docker container. This port can be determined by running the following command:

sudo ./confidentalInfo.sh value confidentalInfo port
keywords.$dockerPort: This is the port the docker container will connect to the application port and expose on your local.
keywords.docker:
A light weight container utility for isolating and standardizing the environment in which your application runs.
Docker Website
keywords.$presistantPath:
This is the phyiscal path that exists on your device.
Relitive paths would not work:
  •     Linux - prefix path with $(pwd)
keywords.$containerPath: The file path that exist within the docker container
keywords.-v:
Volume - this argument is used to identifier file locations you wish to bind with a container location.
(aka --volume)
